titles.title: I Am Determined, I've Made Up My Mind

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am determined, I've made up my mind:
I'll serve the Lord.
I've left the world and its pleasures behind.
I'll serve the Lord.
I'll follow wherever he leadeth.
I'll pasture wherever he feedeth.
I am determined I've made up my mind:
I'll serve the Lord.
